title: Video: Stray Kites- The Ghoster
body:
This is probably one of the most wonderfully angelic videos I’ve seen.

Made by the fantastic **[KEEL HER](http://www.facebook.com/KEELHER)**, using family home videos featuring her and her CITR writer brother ([Ben Keeler](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/author/velocirapta/)) no less, this disjointed and wobbly piece of footage will leave you filled with nostalgia.

Pick up the track and **[Stray Kites](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9414-review-stray-kites-mieux/ "Review: Stray Kites – Mieux")** latest LP, **_Mieux_**, over at their [Bandcamp.](http://straykites.bandcamp.com/)

Pick up the track and Stray Kites latest LP, \[…\]
